price: 87. Mas tu Señor (ha fijado el Corán en tu corazón) por misericordia Suya. Realmente, Su favor sobre ti es inmenso.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
